Container.Name: mtg-roguelike-discord-bot
Container.Overview:
A Discord bot that automatically posts and updates player leaderboards from a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Designed for tracking MTG (Magic: The Gathering) Roguelike game progress with weighted scoring.
Features: - Automated leaderboard with weighted scoring - Auto-update at configurable intervals - Persistent messages (edits instead of spamming) - Rate limit compliant - Clean display formatting
Setup Requirements: 1. Create a Discord bot and get the token 2. Set up Google Sheets API and download service_account.json 3. Place service_account.json in /mnt/user/appdata/mtg-discord-bot/ 4. Configure environment variables below 5. Start the container
Container.Requires: Before starting this container: 1. Create a Discord bot at https://discord.com/developers/applications 2. Enable "Message Content Intent" for your bot 3. Set up Google Sheets API at https://console.cloud.google.com/ 4. Download service_account.json and place it in /mnt/user/appdata/mtg-discord-bot/ 5. Share your Google Sheet with the service account email

Config.Name: Service Account JSON
Config.Description: Google Sheets service account credentials (must exist before starting)

Config.Name: Google Sheet ID
Config.Description: The ID from your Google Sheet URL (between /d/ and /edit)

Config.Name: Leaderboard Channel ID
Config.Description: Discord channel ID where leaderboard will be posted (enable Developer Mode in Discord to copy ID)

Config.Name: Update Interval
Config.Description: How often to update the leaderboard in seconds (default: 300 = 5 minutes)

Config.Name: Google Credentials Path
Config.Description: Path to service account JSON inside container (leave as default)
